title: IP173.214.181.43
author: IP173.214.181.43
content: hi detective alt,i am suspicious of this wallet address transaction activity a group of cheaters send coins to one address.https://imgur.com/yKVK2Yp.pnghttps://ibb.co/dLTP4C5https://bscscan.com/address/0x39ea37db9201993cce7ed8421568eebabdbdc8f5#tokentxns

comments.author: joeperry
comments.body: Can you list down the owners of those addresses? and which campaign they are enrolled to? If this is just a suspicion and you don't have any proof you can list down, this wouldn't be addressed properly.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Looks like you've created two topics with the same method and with accusations of Alt transaction the address they use is the same.I tried looking at one of their addresses that you suspect, the third line address: https://bscscan.com/address/0xd102168ddb823380ef8bd068d56f1e77dccf61ae, and several other addresses.It seems the addresses are all linked to your first topic: Â Topic: help for check bounty cheater.What i saw in your first topic, @_BlackStar, has already given you some of those Alt catches.What, makes you, excited to create a second topic on the same line of accusations, maybe you should work even harder to do some valid evidence on these accusations, if they violate the Bounty campaign, you can immediately show it to the manager, they have special rules for Alt cheats, kicks.
